description: PAK files are primarily used by video games but may also be used by other applications such as the Google Chrome web browser. The format for a PAK file used by one game may differ from the PAK format used for a different game. Therefore, you may have to try multiple programs before opening your PAK file.

common_filenames.description: data.pak - Name given to the main PAK file that stores resource files for a game. The file is typically very large.
